ygData.subject: Re: starting smithing
ygData.msgSnippet: Metal bit are already trivial I think at 22. What I did at this level was to start making scalers. Thay are cheep and require a metal bit anyway. =) These will
ygData.messageBody:
Metal bit are already trivial I think at 22. What I did at this level was to
start making scalers. Thay are cheep and require a metal bit anyway. =)
These will take you to about 42. Once here you can do 2 things lanturns or
skewers. Skewers are cheeper but you fail more often. It was cheeper for me
to make skewers then lanturns and I was on a budget of only 90 plat so i
made those. I got to about 108 making skewers. At this point I tryed to make
some easy armour such as bracers and gorets and I failed about half the
time. I think im going to make skewers till thay get trivial. Any tips for
starting to make armour? Anyone have any idea when some armour pieces become
trivial? I was told to make the one sheet of metal stuff first till trivial
then go on to the 2 sheets. Is this correct?
